highlightText: At a high-level, to get Hadoop working on your system, the steps involve  - Downloading the appropriate Hadoop package (the version to select depends on several criteria such as compatability with other big data tools) - Extracting (untar) the files and directories into an appropriate folder on your system - Configuring the following files         .bashrc        hadoop-env.
it's possible to switch between them

If you face persistant bugs that you can't resolve, check the Hadoop version you used and try another one as many buys are usually due to compatability issues between the Hadoop version, Java version and the operating system you are using.
